attributes.action: BAN FIREWORKS IN BUILT UP AREAS
attributes.additional_details:
Fireworks in built up areas are causing havoc especially for innocent animals such as dogs and cats.

I know of many in my local area who want these unnecessary and dangerous fireworks banned and only allowed in displays.

My story of first disliking fireworks was when my own dog was on a walk and the fireworks started she got free and into the road she was then hit by a car which wouldn't have happened if they weren't so close to home and so loud.

I'm so grateful she's alive and its because of her I want to make sure other pets are safe and don't get injured due to careles, selfish and inconsiderate people who let the fireworks off.
